Html: I have been trying to use the bulk upload feature but I cannot find out where to put the pictures for uploading. Even on the Bulk Upload screen the prompt is only allowing the selection of one file. Am I missing something here?

Please, can anyone advise me on how this feature is supposed to work. I can upload pictures individually into the 'holding area' (wherever that is ) and, presumably, the Upload button will take these files and load them into the system.

Having to upload the pictures individually into the holding area does not fit with the term 'bulk upload'. Is there a way that the client user can point to his/her photo album and bulk load the contents?

I've set the web site to utiles the file system for photos. Will the bulk upload respect that setting or will it load into the Db?
Are you storing the photos in the DB or on the file system?
I am storing the photos on the file system
